head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MCMANUS, OTILE H.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MCMANUS, OTILE H.

block.p: McMANUS--Otile H., 93, died April 21, 2007, in Wayland, MA. Lover of words, music, food and people. Longtime resident of River Edge, NJ, and Center Moriches, NY. Wife of the late Charles V. McManus. Mother of Otile E. McManus of Milton, MA, the late Carol E. McManus, and Julie M. O'Rourke of Pelham, NY. Grandmother of Julia, Maggie, Aidan, Nell and Desmond. Mother - in - law of Robert L. Turner of Milton, and the late Thomas A. O'Rourke. Sister of the late Julia K. Hickey. Funeral Thursday in Boston. Interment Gate of Heaven Cemetery, Valhalla, NY, Saturday, April 28. Meet at office at 11:45am. Donations may be sent to The Miriam Boyd Parlin Residence, Wayside Hospice, 266 Cochituate Rd., Wayland, MA 01778. Visit: www.ccgfuneralhome.com for complete obituary.
